alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 2:05PM PST until February 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY BELOW 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Hail and occasional snow expected below 1000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte and Northern Humboldt Coast Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Small hail accumulating on area roadways will result in hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast
